title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.34 - Evaluation criteria
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.34 - Evaluation criteria

State Regulations

In addition to the applicable evaluation criteria set forth
in section
4243.3
of this Part, the
corporation shall evaluate applications for capital access assistance by
administering corporations in accordance with the following criteria: (a) the applications must demonstrate that
the economic development fund determinations can be made; (b) the extent to which the evaluation
criteria, as applicable, can be met; and
(c) in the case of recapitalizations of
capital access projects, the extent to which the administering corporation can
demonstrate satisfactory administration of the previous program
assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
